data: Thrusting his tousled head through the trap-door, Miles made his third and last inspection for the night.
Rideout, Henry Milner, 1877-1927; Justice, Martin, 1869-1961 [Illustrator]; Woodbury, Charles H. (Charles Herbert), 1864-1940 [Illustrator]
